review: Have you played Pandemic 2? Well if you have, then you will know EXACTLY how fun this game is.You have to infect the WHOLE world and like Pandemic 2 it can be very difficult at first, but as you get into the game then it gets VERY fun watching whole countries fall to a little bug.Overall VERY FUN.
